thread.title: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth’s Valentine’s Day was pretty much all about dogs
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth’s Valentine’s Day was pretty much all about dogs

author: Shaunna Murphy
title: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth’s Valentine’s Day was pretty much all about dogs
text:
Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth’s Valentine’s Day was pretty much all about dogs We love it when couples stay true to themselves on Valentine’s Day, so we’re glad to see that Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth essentially spent their romantic day covered in piles of dogs . (This is also why we’re imagining John Legend and Chrissy Teigen getting tipsy and watching Bravo in formal wear, for what it’s worth.)
Which, in case you’ve somehow missed their social media presence over the past couple of years, is absolutely their version of living their best lives.
Hemsworth, dressed like he was about to go on a dive with Team Zissou on the Belafonte, posted a shot of a hoodie-clad Cyrus enjoying two pups, a gorgeous (Malibu?) beach, and a cup of coffee. He captioned the pic with a Valentine’s rose emoji, which definitely counts as a sign of PDA from the typically more private half of the couple.
Happy valentines 
A post shared by Liam Hemsworth (@liamhemsworth) on Feb 14, 2017 at 7:36pm PST 
Cyrus added another of Hemsworth strolling with the pups down the shoreline, which, you know, looks like absolute heaven. Though we’re pretty sure this is their day-to-day lives.

A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:47am PST 
DOGS DOGS DOGS DOGS DOGS DOGS DOGS. 
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:38am PST 
The couple later joined up with singer-songwriter Angel Olsen, who played a show at the Los Angeles Wiltern .
@angelolsenmusic !!!! @sarahbarthel @phantogram !!!! @liamhemsworth !!!! Happy Valentine's Day!!!! 
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 15, 2017 at 12:45am PST 
…But undoubtedly, the best part of their day was the beach walk with the dogs.
@liamhemsworth & I wish you a VERY love V-Day ❤️ 
A post shared by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Feb 14, 2017 at 8:44am PST 
Teach us how to live your lives, Miley and Liam.
